title: DISCO HITS (v1.1) - The BEST late 70s early 80s disco/dance/funk
description:
DISCO HITS (v1.1) - The BEST late 70's early 80's disco/dance/funk (216 songs)

* This version is an update to my origial Disco Hits collection. Added a
  few, removed a few, plus one or two corrections.

All you need for a groovy Disco Party!

Mostly disco, spanning roughly mid 70's to early 80's with quite a few
funk tunes and a few interesting remakes/remixes thrown in. I put together
this collection thinking of QUALITY not quantity. I tried to limit this
collection to the tunes that were widely known and popular back then,
rather than throw together as many songs as possible. I also decided what
was in or out based on what I liked and what sounded good to me. If we're
lucky, you'll like it too :-)

I hope you enjoy this collection as much as I had fun putting it together.

(A technical note... all mp3's are constant bitrate and have been run
through MP3Gain to normalize the volumes.)
